SNTable.Accessibility.RowsAndColumns.comment: number of rows and columns announced by the screen reader. (tew 210929)

SNTable.Accessibility.NavigationInstruct.value: Use arrow keys to navigate in table cells and tab to move to pagination controls. For the full range of keyboard navigation, see the documentation.
SNTable.Accessibility.NavigationInstruct.comment: Instructions read by screen reader when first focusing inside the table. (tew 211130)

SNTable.Pagination.RowsPerPage.comment: label for the rows per page dropdown. (tew 210929)

SNTable.Pagination.DisplayedRowsLabel.comment: label for the displayed rows, e.g. '1-100 of 234' (tew 211004)

SNTable.Pagination.SelectPage.comment: Label for the dropdown to select a page.

SNTable.Pagination.FirstPage.comment: tooltip and aria-label for the first page button. (tew 220125)

SNTable.Pagination.PreviousPage.comment: tooltip and aria-label for the previous page button. (tew 220125)

SNTable.Pagination.NextPage.comment: tooltip and aria-label for the next page button. (tew 220125)

SNTable.Pagination.LastPage.comment: tooltip and aria-label for the last page button. (tew 220125)

SNTable.Pagination.RowsPerPageChange.value: Rows per page has changed to {0}. Now showing the first page.
SNTable.Pagination.RowsPerPageChange.comment: Read via screenreader when the number rows per page changes. {0} is replaced with the number of rows per page. (tew 211122)

SNTable.Pagination.PageStatusReport.value: Page has changed. Showing page {0} of {1}.
SNTable.Pagination.PageStatusReport.comment: Read via screenreader when the page has changed. {0} is replaced with the current page number. {1} is replaced with the total page number. (tew 211122)

SNTable.SortLabel.SortedAscending.comment: direction of sorting for a column, announced by screen readers. (tew 210929)

SNTable.SortLabel.SortedDescending.comment: direction of sorting for a column, announced by screen readers. (tew 210929)

SNTable.SortLabel.PressSpaceToSort.value: Press space to sort on this column
SNTable.SortLabel.PressSpaceToSort.comment: instructions for sorting, announced by screen readers. (tew 210929)

SNTable.SelectionLabel.OneSelectedValue.value: Currently there is one selected value.
SNTable.SelectionLabel.OneSelectedValue.comment: the amount of selected values in a dimension, announced by screen readers. (tew 210929)

SNTable.SelectionLabel.SelectedValues.comment: the amount of selected values in a dimension, announced by screen readers. (tew 210929)

SNTable.SelectionLabel.DeselectedValue.comment: announced by screen readers when a value is deselected. (tew 210929)

SNTable.SelectionLabel.SelectedValue.comment: announced by screen readers when a value is selected. (tew 210929)

SNTable.SelectionLabel.NotSelectedValue.comment: announced by screen readers when focus is on an unselected value. (tew 210929)

SNTable.SelectionLabel.SelectionsConfirm.comment: announced by screen readers when selections are confirmed. (tew 210929)

SNTable.SelectionLabel.ExitedSelectionMo.value: Value is deselected. Exited selection mode.
SNTable.SelectionLabel.ExitedSelectionMo.comment: Announced by screen readers when deselecting and no values are selecting, causing the the chart to exit selection mode. (tew 210929)

SNTable.SelectionLabel.selected.comment: announced by screen readers for a selected value. (tew 210929)
